column1: The Pit Room////Because it was my first time having TX BBQ
column2: I really wanted to try brisket. However
column3: they'd sold out all their brisket that night! Nonetheless
column4: I had the chance to try their turkey
column6: and pork ribs. The turkey was surprisingly good (flavorful
column7: and definitely not dry). The venison was delicious
column10: and spiced--it was fantastic in the BBQ sauce. The ribs were *delish*
column11: and definitely my favorite of the items I tried. It was fall-off-the-bone
